overview: Sin City films presents the stunning Sondra Hall and the beautiful Monique in a wild tale of young lust and dark seething passion.  Behind Angel's innocent blue eyes lies a hidden world of secret lust & hidden passions... as Angel moves into a young couples guest house...things begin to change, everyone's secret, shameful desires are stripped bare and exposed... for all to see. Angel's sexual games are as endless as her insatiable lust for the strange... the kinky... the forbidden. Award winning director Bud Lee takes a hardcore look at the dark, deviant minds and wet panties of the young, beautiful wild things that lurk behind those white picket fences.
tagline: The Mistake Every Man Want To Make
title: Poison Angel
